description: {"blocks":[{"key":"edv7e","text":"For the passage of trophoblast organoids. Should be done every 5-7 days.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
materials_text: {"blocks":[{"key":"7iprp","text":"24-well TC plate (Costar, 3526)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"c6vl3","text":"Stem Pro Accutase (Gibco, A11105-01)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"ej2im","text":"Y-27635 (Sigma, Y0503-1MG)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"495o9","text":"Finntip 1000, Thermo Fisher, 9405160","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"ag1on","text":"Wide mouth 200 tip Fisher 02-707-134","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"cssnf","text":"StemPro Accutase, Life Technologies, A11105-01 OR TrypLE express, Life Technologies, 12605-028","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

status.info: We use this protocol and it's working

steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"e8cks","text":"Remove old Trophoblast Organoid Medium (TOM) from well using vacuum","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"39d1o","text":"Add   of PBS to each well","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":9,"length":3}],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":4,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"ffaq3","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"500","error":false,"guid":"B643C0C0402311ED99275593579CC335","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"rrtd","text":"Gently scrape off the Matrigel domes (including organoids) using a wide orifice P1000 and transfer the released mixture of Matrigel and organoids into a 15 ml conical tube and briefly pipette several times","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":67,"length":19},{"style":"bold","offset":153,"length":18}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"3rg4k","text":"Centrifuge at   ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":14,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"1ccm1","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"centrifuge","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"centrifuge":"300","duration":240,"error_centrifuge":false,"error_temperature":false,"guid":"7FF65A60403111ED99275593579CC335","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"scientificNotation":{"centrifuge":false,"temperature":false},"start":null,"temperature":"","temperatureUnit":32,"unit":1324}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"2nd98","text":"Carefully remove supernatant as much as possible using a 1 mL pipette and then remove remaining media using a 200 µL tip if necessary. Note: risky to use glass Pasteur pipette and vacuum to aspirate","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":57,"length":12}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"9pbv0","text":"Add   of pre-warmed dissociation reagent plus 5 µM Y-27632 (for a final concentration of 5 µM, add 1 µl for every 500 µl of dissociation agent)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":51,"length":7}],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":4,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"6q6kl","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"500","error":false,"guid":"2115F1C0402411ED99275593579CC335","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"6cokd","text":"Incubate in    for    and vigorously tap conicals against side of water bath  every ~2 min","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":12,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":19,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"6lfne","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"29709DC0402411ED99275593579CC335","id":0,"label":"water bath","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"37","unit":10}},"1":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":0,"guid":"589E06C0403111ED99275593579CC335","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"1ujip","text":"Centrifuge at   ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":14,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"2cmtm","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"centrifuge","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"centrifuge":"400","duration":240,"error_centrifuge":false,"error_temperature":false,"guid":"33BF0E00402511ED99275593579CC335","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"scientificNotation":{"centrifuge":false,"temperature":false},"start":null,"temperature":"","temperatureUnit":32,"unit":1324}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"5q1ru","text":"Remove supernatant as much as possible by using 1 mL pipette and then remove remaining media using a 200 µL tip if necessary. Note: risky to use glass Pasteur pipette and vacuum to aspirate","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":48,"length":12}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"a0av","text":"Add   of TOM","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":4,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"1u4o8","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"200","error":false,"guid":"019F4230402711ED99275593579CC335","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"apu5m","text":"Use autopipette to disturb/resuspend pellet (pipetting time depends on organoid size). Set autopipette to full force (level 8) and use narrow mouth tip. Pipette 200x.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"2l8ua","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"5qp4o","text":"Alternatively, simply manually pipette 200X to disturb cells","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"200ut","text":"Place small drop of suspension on slide and check for single cells. If cells are single progress to next step.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"2et9g","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"2f7bc","text":"If cells are not single, continue to pipette 50X and check for single cells until singles cells are seen.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"6vark","text":"Centrifuge at  ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":14,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"13ko6","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"centrifuge","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"centrifuge":"400","duration":240,"error_centrifuge":false,"error_temperature":false,"guid":"14A233B0402711ED99275593579CC335","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"scientificNotation":{"centrifuge":false,"temperature":false},"start":null,"temperature":"","temperatureUnit":32,"unit":1324}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"9qjof","text":"Remove supernatant using 1 mL pipette and place the 15 mL conical tube with pellet on ice. Note: risky to use glass Pasteur pipette and vacuum to aspirate","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":25,"length":12},{"style":"bold","offset":52,"length":18}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"9h9pd","text":"Resuspend the pellet with pre-thawed Matrigel using a pre-cooled blunt 200 µL pipette tip (Fisher 02-707-134). The amount of Matirgel used for each 24-well is   , calculate the total amount of Matrigel needed.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":37,"length":8},{"style":"bold","offset":65,"length":24}],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":159,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"4v0p5","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"78jn1","text":"Notes: Typically, one 24-well is split into six 24-wells, so you need to resuspend the pellet in 240 µl Matrigel. Matrigel should be kept on ice.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"40","error":false,"guid":"32E3ABB0403111ED99275593579CC335","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"55v98","text":"Carefully dispense    of Matrigel-organoid suspension into a pre-warmed 24-well plate using a cold pipette tip. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":72,"length":13}],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":19,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"cdlje","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"36cea","text":"Notes: I usually set the pipette to 35 µl (there will be lose of some Matrigel/cell mixture). Slowly and carefully lift up the pipette as dispensing the Matrigel into the well to form a dome. Do not push pipette tip fully down as this will introduce air-bubbles.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"e0ubb","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"40","error":false,"guid":"4160EE00403111ED99275593579CC335","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"v1h2","text":"Place the 24-well plate in    incubator for    to allow Matrigel to pre-polymerize","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":27,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":44,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"7tqb","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"4AACB0C0403111ED99275593579CC335","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"37","unit":10}},"1":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":120,"guid":"589E06C0403111ED99275593579CC335","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"e4h62","text":"Flip the plate over and incubate for an additional    to fully polymerize and evenly distribute the organoid fragments throughout the Matrigel","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":51,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"8sa34","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":480,"guid":"5F052020403111ED99275593579CC335","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"a80cn","text":"During the polarization process, prepare a stock of TOM with Y-27632 (final concentration 10 µM; add 1 µl of Y-27632 per 500 µl of TOM). ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":52,"length":3},{"style":"bold","offset":61,"length":7}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"7ulfe","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"fuevr","text":"Note: Need 500 µl of medium per well","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"4spa6","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"6mcu4","text":"Cover the polymerized Matrigel domes with   TOM per well and culture them in a    humidified 5% CO2 incubator.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":44,"length":3}],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":42,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":79,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"fj1oi","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"bk3dh","text":"Note: Fill surrounding wells with   PBS to help decrease evaporation of TOM","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":36,"length":3}],"entityRanges":[{"key":2,"offset":34,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"4euo3","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"500","error":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1}},"1":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"675802E0410011ED99275593579CC335","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"37","unit":10}},"2":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"1","error":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":2}}}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"86i23","text":"Observe daily and renew the TOM every 48-72 hours","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

title: Passaging Trophoblast Organoids
